commands.name: az batch account network-profile set
commands.summary: Set the Network profile for Batch account.
commands.syntax:
az batch account network-profile set --resource-group
                                     [--default-action {Allow, Deny}]
                                     [--name]
                                     [--profile {BatchAccount, NodeManagement}]
examples: az batch account network-profile set -g MyResourceGroup -n MyBatchAccount --profile BatchAccount --default-action Allow

commands.name: az batch account network-profile show
commands.summary: Get information about the Network profile for Batch account.
examples: az batch account network-profile show -g MyResourceGroup -n MyBatchAccount
